title: Holiday haunts
brief_description: Travel documentary of New Zealand showing Rotorua, Maori guides, Papakure Geyser and Puarenga Geyser, Rotorua golf and bowls, swimming and spa, Lake Poto-iti, fairy springs where the salmon trout are hand-fed.
